info.name: Vallhalla API Modular Collection
info.description: API collection structured by module and HTTP method for Vallhalla API with RBAC permissions.

item.name: 6. Admin - Get All Users
item.description: Admin has permission to view all users

item.name: 7. Admin - Get All Apartments
item.description: Admin has permission to view all apartments

item.name: 8. Owner - Get My Profile
item.description: Owner can access their own profile

item.name: 9. Owner - Get Own Apartments
item.description: Owner can only view their own apartments

item.name: 10. Security - Get All Visitors
item.description: Security has permission to view visitors

item.name: 11. Security - Try to Access Apartments (Should Fail)
item.description: Security doesn't have permission to view apartments (should return 403)

item.name: Get All Apartments (Admin Access)
item.description: Requires 'apartments:read' permission (Admin has access to all apartments)

item.description: Owners can access their own profile

item.name: Get Owner's Apartments
item.description: Owners can only see their own apartments

item.name: Get All Users (Should Fail)
item.description: Should return 403 Forbidden (Owners don't have 'users:read' permission)

item.name: Get All Apartments (Should Fail)
item.description: Should return 403 Forbidden (Security doesn't have 'apartments:read' permission)
